headline: NXP Semiconductors N.V. (NXPI) Struggled Due To Auto, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 11 Stocks That Jim Cramer Recently Talked About. NXP Semiconductors N.V. (NASDAQ:NXPI) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. NXP Semiconductors N.V. (NASDAQ:NXPI) is a semiconductor company that manufactures application sensors, power controllers, and other products. The firm’s primary customers are in the auto industry. NXP Semiconductors N.V.
